mapper.select: SELECT a.code_id id, IFNULL(a.parent_code_id, '0') pId, a.`name`, false lay_is_open FROM t_area a WHERE 3 > a.level
SELECT a.id, a.`name` FROM t_area a WHERE a.level = '0'
SELECT a.id, a.`name` FROM t_area a, t_area b WHERE a.level = '1' AND a.parent_code_id = b.code_id AND b.id = #{id}
SELECT a.id, a.`name` FROM t_area a, t_area b WHERE a.level = '2' AND a.parent_code_id = b.code_id AND b.id = #{id}
SELECT a.id, a.`name` FROM t_area a, t_area b WHERE a.level = '3' AND a.parent_code_id = b.code_id AND b.id = #{id}
